readable.content: A boy in a Mets jersey poses on his bike . A boy in a New York Mets shirt sitting on a toy Harly Davison motorcycle on a tennis court . A boy wearing a Mets jersey is riding a moter bike on the playground . A young boy wearing a Mets jersey poses on a toy motorcycle in a recreational area . Little boy rides around playground on a motorized bike .
